items.title: During heated hearing, Rubio insists US action in Venezuela will lead to prosperity and security
items.description: The US Secretary of State remained robustly on message when asked about the legality of Maduro's removal, plans for oil sales, and the future of Venez...

items.title: Trump warns Iran 'time is running out' for nuclear deal as US military builds up in Gulf
items.description: Tehran says its armed forces are ready "with their fingers on the trigger" to respond to any aggression.

items.title: Iran's internet is returning - but not for everyone
items.description: The country cut off internet access on 8 January following a government crackdown on protesters.

items.title: Deutsche Bank offices raided in money laundering probe
items.description: Officials searched offices in Frankfurt and Berlin in relation to "past business relationships".

items.title: 'Don't take us to a hospital': Iran protesters treated in secret to avoid arrest
items.description: Wounded demonstrators tell the BBC they are relying on medics willing to risk their own safety by treating them at their homes.
